definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: It turned our homes into funeral tents.
sentences.chinese: 侵略者把我們家園變成了喪棚。

sentences.english: After eight years of fighting, the Chinese people at lastdefeated the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 經過八年浴血奮戰，中國人民終於打敗了日本侵略者。

sentences.english: “The two invaders appear to be equally matched.”, ” Moffett says.
sentences.chinese: 這兩幫侵略者看來勢均力敵。

sentences.english: The aggressors could not get supplies or reinforcements through because of the guerrilla warfare.
sentences.chinese: 由於游擊戰的牽制，侵略者無法輸送給養或援兵。

sentences.english: The invaders brazened their way into our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 侵略者肆無忌憚地闖入了我們祖國。

sentences.english: The villagers drove the invaders away in a fight flashing with knives and swords.
sentences.chinese: 在一場刀光劍影的格鬥中，村民們把侵略者趕跑了。

sentences.english: Nanjing city was sacked by Japanese aggressors.
sentences.chinese: 南京曾遭受過日本侵略者的洗劫。

sentences.english: The invaders' war elephants bolted, killing vast numbers of soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 侵略者的戰象受驚嚇而狂奔，踩死了大量士兵。

sentences.english: The true contempt of an invader is shown by deeds of valour in the field-hermocrates of syracuse.
sentences.chinese: 侵略者真正的蔑視表現在戰場上勇猛的行爲。

sentences.english: They suffered a lot under the invader's heel.
sentences.chinese: 在侵略者的鐵蹄下，他們受盡了奴役。

sentences.english: The people of the whole country got united to rise up against the foreign invaders.
sentences.chinese: 全國人民團結起來反抗外國侵略者。

sentences.english: It also brought waves of alien invaders looking for the secrets of Protoculture.
sentences.chinese: 它也帶來了幾波太空侵略者，尋找史前文化的祕密。

sentences.english: His written confession discloses the ferocity of the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 這份筆供揭露了侵略者的暴行。

sentences.english: I don't really mean on being another "INVADER" to this site.
sentences.chinese: 我真的不意味着在被另一個“侵略者”到這個網站。

sentences.english: We will take the aggressors on and wipe them out resolutely.
sentences.chinese: 我們將迎擊侵略者，並堅決地消滅他們。

sentences.english: During the period of the War of Resistance Against Japan, he refused to act for the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 在抗日戰爭時期，他曾拒絕爲日本侵略者演戲。

definition: to invade China (referring to 19th century imperialist powers and Japan)
Japanese devil (common term of abuse in wartime China and in subsequent writing)
